pullRequest.body:
Everywhere we have a `smul_mem_pointwise_smul` lemma, I've added this result.

```suggestion
theorem pointwise_smul_mono_right (a : Î±) :
    Monotone (HSMul.hSMul a : Submodule R M â†’ Submodule R M) :=
```

```suggestion
@[deprecated smul_mono_right] theorem set_smul_mono_right {p q : Submodule R M} (le : p â‰¤ q) :
```

Can you add a version with the `gcongr` attribute (I think it has to be formulated separately using `\le`).
